entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
